name: Communication
info: Strong verbal and written skills; experienced in delivering presentations, drafting reports, and clear communication, mainly in academic settings.

name: Teamwork
info: Proven ability to collaborate effectively in teams; experienced in contributing to and leading group projects.

name: Problem Solving
info: Skilled in quickly identifying and resolving issues; adept at troubleshooting and optimising solutions.

name: Adaptability
info: Quick learner with the ability to adjust to new challenges, tools, and environments efficiently.

name: Time Management
info: Capable of managing multiple tasks, prioritising effectively, and meeting deadlines without compromising quality.

name: Leadership
info: Experienced in guiding and motivating teams to achieve goals; strong decision-making and delegation skills.

name: Conflict Resolution
info: Skilled in mediating disputes and finding common ground; adept at maintaining positive relationships even during challenging situations.

name: Empath
info: Ability to understand and share the feelings of others; skilled in active listening and providing thoughtful feedback.

name: Critical Thinking
info: Able to evaluate information objectively and make sound judgments; experienced in analyzing complex scenarios.

name: Initiative
info: Proactive in identifying opportunities and taking action without being prompted; capable of working independently with minimal supervision.

name: Persuasion
info: Effective in influencing opinions and gaining support; skilled in presenting compelling arguments and negotiating outcomes.

name: Emotional Intelligence
info: Adept at recognizing and managing one's emotions and understanding others' emotions to foster strong interpersonal relationships.

name: Networking
info: Skilled in building and maintaining professional relationships; experienced in connecting with individuals to share knowledge and resources.

name: Active Listening
info: Strong ability to focus on and understand others' perspectives; experienced in providing feedback that demonstrates comprehension.

name: Negotiation
info: Adept at reaching mutually beneficial agreements; skilled in resolving differences effectively and fostering win-win solutions.
